titleStmt.title: The power of praier A sermon preached in the Cathedrall Church of Exeter in August. 1596. By Thomas Playfere Professour of Diuinitie for the Ladie Margaret in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Playfere, Thomas, 1561?-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. 1603. And are to be sold in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
